page.title: 13Recreation Cont'd
page.content: Carron Iron Works had a sand store close to Stenhousemuir.Rain formed a pool in the centre of the sand.There were washing greens close by and the area was used as a{play}area the sand ,grass and water providing excellent entertainment.When the Works stopped using the sand,the local authority took the area over,formed a boating pond from the old pool,flattened over the sand and created a grassy{park known as The Crownest Park.It became the George V Memorial Playing Fields but is still best known as the{lido. } There were putting,trampolines,litter bins,an old tractor,chutes,swings, tennis courts,and a well used and maintained boating pond.20 years ago,it was a favourite place for Sunday School Outings.
